Devlin Junker

Senior Software Engineer at Forward Networks

Passionate about Front-end application design and development, with experience creating exciting, user-focused, single page web applications with JavaScript/Typescript Frameworks.

Full Stack experience with Node, PHP and Java Web Service development, including integration with SQL data stores and other backend microservices hosted on AWS and self-hosted servers.
